LanguageData.RGK_Wall.label: 復古牆
LanguageData.RGK_Wall.description: 無法通行的牆。 能夠撐起屋頂。
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Blueprint.label: 復古牆（藍圖）
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Frame.label: 復古牆（建造中）
LanguageData.RGK_Wall_Frame.description: 無法通行的牆。 能夠撐起屋頂。
LanguageData.GL_Wall.label: wall
LanguageData.GL_Wall.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.GL_Wall_Blueprint.label: wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_Wall_Frame.label: wall (building)
LanguageData.GL_Wall_Frame.description: An impassable wall. Capable of holding up a roof.
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall.label: 通風牆
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall.description: 這是一個有通風口的復古牆，空氣可以進出。
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Blueprint.label: 通風復古牆（藍圖）
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Frame.label: 通風復古牆（建造中）
LanguageData.RGK_VentWall_Frame.description: 這是一個有通風口的復古牆，空氣可以進出。
LanguageData.GL_VentWall.label: vent wall
LanguageData.GL_VentWall.description: It's a wall where air can come in and out.
LanguageData.GL_VentWall_Blueprint.label: vent wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_VentWall_Frame.label: vent wall (building)
LanguageData.GL_VentWall_Frame.description: It's a wall where air can come in and out.
LanguageData.RGK_window.label: 窗戶
LanguageData.RGK_window.description: 這是一個可以向外看的窗口，你可以透過它看到外面的景色。
LanguageData.RGK_window_Blueprint_Install.label: 窗戶（藍圖）
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall.label: 有窗的牆
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall.description: 陽光可以透過窗口曬近來，也能通風的窗口。 並沒有玻璃，所以你無法關上它。
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Blueprint.label: 有窗的牆（藍圖）
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Frame.label: 有窗的牆（建造中）
LanguageData.RGK_WindowWall_Frame.description: 陽光可以透過窗口曬近來，也能通風的窗口。 並沒有玻璃，所以你無法關上它。
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall.label: window wall
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall.description: A window through which light can pass through.
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall_Blueprint.label: window wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall_Frame.label: window wall (building)
LanguageData.GL_WindowWall_Frame.description: A window through which light can pass through.
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence.label: 柵欄
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence.description: 用柵欄來圈養家畜以保護它們免受外來野獸的襲擊。 這東西竟然也能支撐屋頂。
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Blueprint.label: 柵欄（藍圖）
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Frame.label: 柵欄（建造中）
LanguageData.RGK_WoodFence_Frame.description: 用柵欄來圈養家畜以保護它們免受外來野獸的襲擊。 這東西竟然也能支撐屋頂。
LanguageData.GL_FlowerWall.label: Flower wall
LanguageData.GL_FlowerWall_Blueprint.label: Flower wall (blueprint)
LanguageData.GL_FlowerWall_Frame.label: Flower wall (building)
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld.label: antique door
LanguageData.RGK_DoorOld.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
LanguageData.RGK_Door.label: 柵欄門
LanguageData.RGK_Door.description: 劃分房間。 必須手動打開簡單的門，這會減慢人們的速度。 減速量取決於構成柵欄門的材料。
LanguageData.GL_DoorFrame.label: door frame
LanguageData.GL_DoorFrame.description: It is a frame to decorate the door.
